trans-unit.source: Specifies and configures the services that are to be active in the domain which is entered when calling <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceDomain.Enter*> or creating an <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir og konfigurerer tjenestene som skal være aktive i domenet som er angitt når du kaller <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceDomain.Enter*>eller opprette en <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Activity"> </xref>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceDomain.Enter*>

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceDomain.Enter%2A> and <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.%23ctor%2A> allow you to use the services configured by ServiceConfig with no need to tie those services to a component.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceDomain.Enter%2A>og <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.%23ctor%2A>lar deg bruke tjenestene som er konfigurert av ServiceConfig med trenger ikke for å knytte disse tjenestene til en komponent.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.%23ctor%2A></xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceDomain.Enter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"></xref> class, setting the properties to configure the desired services.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"> </xref> klasse, angi egenskapene til å konfigurere de ønskede tjenestene.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>

trans-unit.source: |Item|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`Binding`|<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BindingOption>| |`BringYourOwnTransaction`|`null`| |`COMTIIntrinsicsEnabled`|`false`| |`IISIntrinsicsEnabled`|`false`| |`Inheritance`|<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption>| |`IsolationLevel`|<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionIsolationLevel>| |`PartitionId`|A zero GUID.| |`PartitionOption`|<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.PartitionOption>| |`SxsDirectory`|`null`| |`SxsName`|`null`| |`SxsOption`|<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption>| |`Synchronization`|<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption>| |`ThreadPool`|<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ThreadPoolOption>| |`TipUrl`|`null`| |`TrackingAppName`|`null`| |`TrackingComponentName`|`null`| |`TrackingEnabled`|`false`| |`Transaction`|<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption>| |`TransactionDescription`|`null`| |`TransactionTimeout`|The system default|
trans-unit.target: | Elementet | Beskrivelse | |----------|-----------------| | `Binding`| <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BindingOption>| | `BringYourOwnTransaction`|`null`| | `COMTIIntrinsicsEnabled`|`false`| | `IISIntrinsicsEnabled`|`false`| | `Inheritance`| <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption>| | `IsolationLevel`| <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionIsolationLevel>| | `PartitionId`| En null GUID. | | `PartitionOption`| <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.PartitionOption>| | `SxsDirectory`|`null`| | `SxsName`|`null`| | `SxsOption`| <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption>| | `Synchronization`| <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption>| | `ThreadPool`| <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ThreadPoolOption>| | `TipUrl`|`null`| | `TrackingAppName`|`null`| | `TrackingComponentName`|`null`| | `TrackingEnabled`|`false`| | `Transaction`| <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption>| | `TransactionDescription`|`null`| | `TransactionTimeout`| Systemstandard |</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ThreadPoolOption> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.PartitionOption> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionIsolationLevel> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BindingOption>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"></xref> is not supported on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"></xref>støttes ikke i den gjeldende plattformen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the binding option, which indicates whether all work submitted by the activity is to be bound to only one single-threaded apartment (STA).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir alternativet bindingen, som angir om alle jobb som er sendt inn av aktiviteten skal bindes til bare én single-threaded apartment (STA).

trans-unit.source: Binding has no impact on the multithreaded apartment (MTA).
trans-unit.target: Bindingen har ingen innvirkning på flere tråder apartment (MTA).

trans-unit.source: This property is used to set the thread pool binding only when creating a <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes til å angi tråd applikasjonsutvalget bindingen bare når du oppretter en <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity>

trans-unit.source: An error is returned if an attempt is made to set the thread pool binding when calling <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceDomain.Enter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: En feilmelding hvis det er gjort forsøk på å angi tråd applikasjonsutvalget bindingen når du kaller <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceDomain.Enter%2A>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceDomain.Enter%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.BindingOption"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.BindingOption"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.BindingOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.BindingOption"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"></xref> that represents an existing transaction that supplies the settings used to run the transaction identified by <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"> </xref> som representerer en eksisterende transaksjon som inneholder innstillinger som brukes til å kjøre transaksjonen ble identifisert av <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: BringYourOwnSystemTransaction (BYOT) identifies a transaction that supplies the context for the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> transaction.
trans-unit.target: BringYourOwnSystemTransaction (HENTING) identifiserer en transaksjon som leverer konteksten for den <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>transaksjonen.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>

trans-unit.source: When you bring your own transaction, that transaction's settings override the other transaction settings in the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> object.
trans-unit.target: Når du Bruk din egen transaksjonen, innstillinger for denne transaksjonen overstyrer andre transaksjonen innstillingene i den <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>objektet.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>

trans-unit.source: The default value for <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.BringYourOwnTransaction%2A> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.BringYourOwnTransaction%2A>er `null`.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.BringYourOwnTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on BYOT, see <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BYOT>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om HENTING, kan du se <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BYOT>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BYOT>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Transactions.Transaction"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction"></xref> that represents an existing transaction that supplies the settings used to run the transaction identified by <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction"> </xref> som representerer en eksisterende transaksjon som inneholder innstillinger som brukes til å kjøre transaksjonen ble identifisert av <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: BringYourOwnTransaction (BYOT) identifies a transaction that supplies the context for the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> transaction.
trans-unit.target: BringYourOwnTransaction (HENTING) identifiserer en transaksjon som leverer konteksten for den <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>transaksjonen.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>

trans-unit.source: When you bring your own transaction, that transaction's settings override the other transaction settings in the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> object.
trans-unit.target: Når du Bruk din egen transaksjonen, innstillinger for denne transaksjonen overstyrer andre transaksjonen innstillingene i den <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>objektet.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>

trans-unit.source: The default value for BringYourOwnTransaction is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for BringYourOwnTransaction `null`.

trans-unit.source: For more information on BYOT, see <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BYOT>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om HENTING, kan du se <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BYOT>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.BYOT>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) intrinsics are enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om intrinsics er COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Enables passing context properties from the COMTI into the context for this class.
trans-unit.target: Kan sende Kontekstegenskaper fra COMTI i konteksten for denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: The COMTI eases the task of wrapping mainframe transactions and business logic as COM components.
trans-unit.target: COMTI forenkler arbeidsoppgaven for wrapping stormaskin transaksjoner og metoder som COM-komponenter.

trans-unit.source: Configures the COMTI intrinsics for the work that is done.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurerer COMTI intrinsics er for arbeidet er ferdig.

trans-unit.source: The COMTI eases the task of wrapping mainframe transactions and business logic with transactions.
trans-unit.target: COMTI forenkler arbeidsoppgaven for wrapping stormaskin transaksjoner og metoder med transaksjoner.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if COMTI intrinsics are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis intrinsics er COMTI er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Internet Information Services (IIS) intrinsics are enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om intrinsics er Internet Information Services (IIS) er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: Enables passing IIS context properties, such as an application session object or a user session object, into the context for this class.
trans-unit.target: Kan sende IIS Kontekstegenskaper, for eksempel et application session-objekt eller en bruker session-objektet i konteksten for denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if IIS intrinsics are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis intrinsics er IIS er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to construct a new context based on the current context or to create a new context based solely on the information in <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om å lage en ny kontekst basert på gjeldende kontekst eller opprette en ny kontekst basert utelukkende på informasjonen i <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.InheritanceOption"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the isolation level of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Isolasjonsnivået for transaksjonen.

trans-unit.source: A new transaction is created if the enclosing transaction is not running at the specified isolation level.
trans-unit.target: Hvis omsluttende transaksjonen ikke kjører på det angitte Isolasjonsnivået, opprettes en ny transaksjon.

trans-unit.source: IsolationLevel is ignored if the enclosed code would not otherwise run in a transaction.
trans-unit.target: IsolationLevel ignoreres hvis vedlagte koden ikke hvis ikke kjøres i en transaksjon.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionIsolationLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionIsolationLevel"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionIsolationLevel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionIsolationLevel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the GUID for the COM+ partition that is to be used.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir GUIDEN for COM +-partisjoner som skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: The GUID for the partition to be used.
trans-unit.target: GUID for partisjonen som skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: The default is a zero GUID.
trans-unit.target: Standard er en null GUID.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates how partitions are used for the enclosed work.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvordan partisjoner brukes for arbeidet som ble lukket.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.PartitionOption"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.PartitionOption"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.PartitionOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.PartitionOption"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the directory for the side-by-side assembly for the enclosed work.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir mappen for side ved side-samlingen for arbeidet som ble lukket.

trans-unit.source: Configures side-by-side assemblies for this <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurerer-samlinger side ved side for <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>

trans-unit.source: You must set the SxsDirectory property, if you create a new side-by-side assembly by setting the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.SxsOption%2A> property to <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption>.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi egenskapen SxsDirectory Hvis du oppretter en ny side-ved-side-samling ved angivelse av <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.SxsOption%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.SxsOption%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the directory to be used for the side-by-side assembly.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på mappen som skal brukes for side ved side-samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file name of the side-by-side assembly for the enclosed work.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på side-ved-side-samlingen for arbeidet som ble lukket.

trans-unit.source: The file name of the side-by-side assembly.
trans-unit.target: Filnavnet for samlingen side-ved-side.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates how to configure the side-by-side assembly.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvordan du konfigurerer side-ved-side-samlingen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SxsOption"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value in that indicates the type of automatic synchronization requested by the component.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvilken type automatiske synkroniseringen ble forespurt av komponenten.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates the thread pool which runs the work submitted by the activity.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir thread pool som kjører arbeidet som ble sendt av aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ThreadPoolOption"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ThreadPoolOption"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ThreadPoolOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ThreadPoolOption"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Transaction Internet Protocol (TIP) URL that allows the enclosed code to run in an existing transaction.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen for Transaction Internet Protocol (TIP) som tillater vedlagte koden til å kjøre i en eksisterende transaksjon.

trans-unit.source: TipUrl is similar to the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.BringYourOwnTransaction%2A> property but allows the enclosed code to run as an existing transaction that is specified by a TIP URL.
trans-unit.target: TipUrl er lik den <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.BringYourOwnTransaction%2A>egenskapen kan men vedlagte koden til å kjøre som en eksisterende transaksjon som er angitt av en tips URL-adresse.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.BringYourOwnTransaction%2A>

trans-unit.source: A TIP URL.
trans-unit.target: EN TIPS URL-ADRESSE.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a text string that corresponds to the application ID under which tracker information is reported.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en tekststreng som svarer til program-IDen som rapporteres sporing informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Because no component is associated with this tracker property, tracker activity is reported as arising from a component with the name specified by TrackingAppName.
trans-unit.target: Fordi ingen komponent er tilknyttet denne sporing-egenskapen, rapporteres sporing aktivitet som som oppstår fra en komponent med navnet som er angitt av TrackingAppName.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.TrackingEnabled%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.TrackingEnabled%2A>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.TrackingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application ID under which tracker information is reported.
trans-unit.target: Program-IDen informasjonen rapporteres under som sporing.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a text string that corresponds to the context name under which tracker information is reported.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en tekststreng som svarer til kontekstnavnet sporing informasjonen rapporteres som.

trans-unit.source: The context name under which tracker information is reported.
trans-unit.target: Kontekstnavnet informasjonen rapporteres under som sporing.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether tracking is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om endringssporing er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: The tracker is a reporting mechanism used by monitoring applications to watch running COM+ components.
trans-unit.target: Sporing er en reporting metode som brukes av overvåking programmer for å se kjører COM +-komponenter.

trans-unit.source: It is the reporting mechanism behind the spinning component icons in the Component Services administrative tool.
trans-unit.target: Det er reporting mekanisme bak spinnende komponent ikonene i det administrative verktøyet for komponenttjenester.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if tracking is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis endringssporing er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates how transactions are used in the enclosed work.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvordan transaksjoner brukes i den vedlagte jobben.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.TransactionOption"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name that is used when transaction statistics are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet som skal brukes når transaksjonen statistikk vises.

trans-unit.source: If a description if not provided, the value of <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.TrackingComponentName%2A> is used to describe the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en beskrivelse Hvis ikke angitt verdien for <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.TrackingComponentName%2A>Beskrivelse av transaksjonen.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.TrackingComponentName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name used when transaction statistics are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Navnet som brukes når transaksjonen statistikk vises.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the transaction time-out for a new transaction.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tidsavbruddet for transaksjonen for en ny transaksjon.

trans-unit.source: The transaction time-out, in seconds.
trans-unit.target: Det transaksjonen tidsavbruddet i sekunder.
